checkboxLabel.deleteCurrentDataDir: Delete my current data directory instead

message.incompatibleDataDir: Your current data directory is incompatible with this version of Mantis Wallet.
message.incompatibleDataDirAction: We'll rename your old data directory from "{{oldDirName}}" to "{{newDirName}}".
message.deleteDatadirConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{directory}}"?
message.mantisFailedToStart: Please check whether you have all prerequisites installed. For more info, see https://docs.mantisclient.io/

noVersionTxt.title: Unversioned datadir
noVersionTxt.message: The selected Mantis datadir doesn't have a version.txt
noVersionTxt.detail:
If it's an old datadir, choose the "Move / delete" option.

If you created this datadir with the current Mantis node CLI (on the command line), select the "Add version.txt" option.

selectDatadir.freeSpaceWarning:
Recommended free space:
    5gb+ for testnets
    50gb+ for Mainnet (FastSync)
selectDatadir.openDialogTitle: Select the directory where the Mantis datadir should be placed

error.couldNotExtractCertificateData: Could not extract generated certificate data
error.portsAlreadyInUse: It seems like the node is already running which prevents Mantis Wallet from launching. The following ports are in use: {{ports}}
